name: 陳宏佳
objective:
資料庫管理課程旨在介紹學生資料庫的基本概念和技能，包括關聯式資料庫和非關聯式資料庫。學生將學習關聯式資料庫的特徵、關聯性和擴充性，以及與程式和非關聯式資料庫的差異。同時，他們將瞭解關聯式資料庫的架構，並學習如何避重複群和重複記錄的問題。此外，課程還將介紹非關聯式資料庫的概念和使用情境，讓學生了解其特點和適用性。這門課程將培養學生在關聯式和非關聯式資料庫管理方面的知識和技能，為他們日後在資料庫領域的工作和研究提供基礎。

The Database Management course aims to introduce students to the fundamental concepts and skills of database management, including relational and non-relational databases. Students will learn about the features, relationships, and scalability of relational databases, as well as the differences between relational databases and non-relational databases. They will also explore the architecture of relational databases and learn how to avoid issues such as duplicate groups and duplicate records. Additionally, the course will introduce the concept and use cases of non-relational databases, allowing students to understand their characteristics and applicability. This course will cultivate students' knowledge and skills in both relational and non-relational database management, providing a foundation for their future work and research in the field of databases.
schedule:
Week 1: 課程介紹 (Course Introduction)
Week 2: 資料庫基本概念 - Database Fundamentals
Week 3: 關聯式資料庫特徵、資料庫架構 - Relational Database Features, Database Architecture
Week 4: 資料庫操作、資料檢索 - Database Operations, Data Retrieval
Week 5: 資料庫保護機制、安全性 - Database Security Mechanisms, Security
Week 6: 資料庫操作技術、優化 - Database Manipulation Techniques, Optimization
Week 7: 資料庫索引、檢視 - Database Indexing, Views
Week 8: 資料庫預存程序、觸發器 - Database Stored Procedures, Triggers
Week 9: 期中考周 (midterm exam)
Week 10: 資料庫設計流程、實體關聯模型 - Database Design Process, Entity-Relationship Model
Week 11: 資料庫安裝、配置 - Database Installation, Configuration
Week 12: 資料庫使用者管理、權限設定 - Database User Management, Permission Settings
Week 13: 資料庫驅動程式、函式庫 - Database Drivers, Libraries
Week 14: 資料庫備份、維護 - Database Backup, Maintenance
Week 15: 資料庫運作注意事項 - Database Operational Considerations
Week 16: 資料庫應用程式開發機制 - Database Application Development Mechanisms
Week 17: 資料庫應用、實際案例 - Database Applications, Real-world Examples
Week 18: 期末考周 (final exam)
